name: DailySpecials
0:
”Alexa, ask Daily Specials for Cafe Metro”
”Alexa, ask Daily Specials for Cafe Metro at 14 East 42nd Street”
”Alexa, tell Daily Specials to give me Cafe Metro”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: daily specials
des: Use Daily Specials to get the daily specials menu from restaurants that use the emenuPlus restaurant ecommerce system. Specific restaurant locations may be queried by location address.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
